login.title: Login
login.passwordError: Requirements: min. 8 characters, an uppercase letter and a number.

registration.title: Registration
registration.passwordError: Requirements: min. 8 characters, an uppercase letter and a number.

changePassword.title: Change Password
changePassword.message: Your password has been successfully updated!

successfulRegistration: We sent a verification code to your email account. After checking it please <1>log in</1> to continue.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot your password?
forgotPassword.message: Please enter the email address associated with your account and we'll email you a password reset link.

forgotPasswordVerification.title: Set new password
forgotPasswordVerification.message: Please enter the verification code sent to your email address below, your email address and a new password.
forgotPasswordVerification.errorMessage: Invalid verification code or email address!

welcome.title: Welcome
welcome.popupMsgCancelDescription: By choosing to cancel you will lose the progress.
welcome.popupMsgTimeErrDescription: The time period is not properly selected. If the event takes place in a single day, start time must be before end time.
welcome.popupMsgDateErrDescription: The date period is not properly selected. Start date must be before end date.
welcome.popupErrMsgDescription: There are fields that have not been filled correctly. In order to move forward, please offer a valid input.
welcome.popupErrMsgNotFilled: There are still fields that have not yet been filled. In order to move forward, please finish the form.
welcome.errMsgOverviewFirstDayInPast: the first day of the event can't be in the past
welcome.errMsgOverviewFirstDayAfterLast: the first day of the event can't be after the last
welcome.errMsgOverviewLastDayBeforeFirst: the last day of the event can't be before the first
welcome.errMsgOverviewOneDayEventStartTimeErr: if it is a one day event, you must choose the start time to be earlier than the end time
welcome.errMsgOverviewOneDayEventEndTimeErr: if it is a one day event, you must choose the end time to be later than the start time
welcome.imageErrorMessage: An error occurred while uploading images
welcome.imageDragAndDrop: Drag and drop some files here, or click to select files
welcome.imageDialogTitle: Do you want to remove this image?
welcome.imageDialogContent: If you delete the image, you will not be able to recover it later.
